titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [23. 10. 1913]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift (Cambridge Letters, S. 43). Publiziert (Cambridge Letters, S. 43; WiC, S. 48).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: My address is: L. W. c/o H. Draegni, Skjolden, Sogn, Norway. The place is very nice and I have got plenty of time to work. Identity plays hell with me! Please ask Russell whether he has got my letter because I am not certain if it has been posted. Let me know exactly how you are.
